tgt_original: 行作何業而於諸趣顯現有情。

src_original: bhave ca sattvān saṃmohayati pratyayaśca (Abhidh-s 27)  bhavati saṃskārāṇām //
saṃskārāḥ kiṃkarmakāḥ /  gatiṣu ca sattvān vibhajanti pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānavāsanāyāḥ //
tgt_original: 識作何業能持有情業之纏縛。 亦與名色而作緣也。

src_original: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kiṃkarmakam //  ātmabhāvaparipūriṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratya yaśca bhavati sparśasya //
tgt_original: 亦與六入而作緣也。 六入作何業令諸有情圓滿受身觸作緣也。

src_original: sparśaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ /  viṣayopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ /  vedanā kiṃkarmikā /
tgt_original: 觸作何業令諸有情受用於境受作緣也。 受作何業令諸有情趣生受用愛作緣也。

src_original: janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati tṛṣṇāyāḥ //  tṛṣṇā kiṃkarmikā /
tgt_original: 愛作何業令諸有情而引於生取作緣也。

src_original: janmani ca sattvānākarṣayati pratyayaśca bhavati upādānasya //  upādānaṃ kiṃkarmakam /  punarbhavādānārthaṃ sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti pratyayaśca bhavati bhavasya //  bhavaḥ kiṃkarmakaḥ /
tgt_original: 取作何業取後有故令諸有情而識有取有□□□□□□作緣也。

src_original: punarbhave ca sattvānabhimukhīkaroti pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ //  jātiḥ kiṃkarmikā /
tgt_original: 有作何業令諸有情趣向後有生作緣也。

src_original: nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya //  jarāmaraṇaṃ kiṃkarmakam /
tgt_original: 生作何業令諸有情次第成就名色六入。 老死作何業令諸有情數數轉變壽及命也　十二支法釋名者。
